summary: Vernon A. Walters is mentioned in three documents. One document indicates that as Acting Director, he provided the FBI with information from the CIA regarding individuals and companies connected to the Watergate incident. This included names like Frank Sturgis, Eugenio Martinez, Bernard Barker, Virgilio Gonzales, Robert R. Mullen Company, General Foods Corporation, and James McCord, detailing their past or present associations with the CIA. The other two documents do not provide any information about Walters.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Vernon A. Walters' significance in the JFK context is not directly apparent. The documents focus on his role as Acting Director of the CIA providing information to the FBI regarding the Watergate incident and other CIA activities.
